lead_paragraph: No longer concerned about titles and honors, Novak Djokovic is instead trying to rediscover the inner joy he used to have while playing tennis.
snippet: No longer concerned about titles and honors, Novak Djokovic is instead trying to rediscover the inner joy he used to have while playing tennis....

headline.main: With New Mindset, Djokovic Wins 1st Match Since US Open
headline.print_headline: With New Mindset, Djokovic Wins 1st Match Since US Open
